allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=studymate_user psql -h localhost -U studymate_user -d studymate -c "SELECT version, description, installed_on, success FROM flyway_schema_history ORDER BY installed_rank;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=studymate_user psql -h localhost -U studymate_user -d studymate -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' ORDER BY table_name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=studymate_user psql -h localhost -U studymate_user -d studymate -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users CASCADE;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=studymate_user psql -h localhost -U studymate_user -d studymate -c "SELECT constraint_name, table_name, constraint_type FROM information_schema.table_constraints WHERE table_schema = ''public'' ORDER BY table_name, constraint_type;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=studymate_user psql -h localhost -U studymate_user -d studymate -c "SELECT indexname, tablename FROM pg_indexes WHERE schemaname = ''public'' ORDER BY tablename, indexname;")
